abstract: Assn for Neighborhood and Housing Development releases interactive map of New York City that uses information from public databases to identify neighborhoods where low-income residents may be threatened by sharp rent hikes.

headline.print_headline: Map Tool Signals Areas Where Rents May Soar
headline.main: New Tool Shows New York Neighborhoods at Risk of Rent Hikes

keywords.value: Assn for Neighborhood and Housing Development
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Housing groups unveiled an interactive map that looks at real estate trends to identify areas where tenants may need more city protections....
lead_paragraph: Housing groups unveiled an interactive map that looks at real estate trends to identify areas where tenants may need more city protections.
